newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Hour Glass sells 25 pct Malaysian stake.
newsitem.headline: Hour Glass sells 25 pct Malaysian stake.

text.p: Watch retail chain The Hour Glass Ltd said on Wednesday it had sold a 25 percent share of its Malaysian subsidiary to a local partner.

It said in a statement it entered a joint venture agreement with Iqrah Holdings Sdn Bhd, headed by businessman Mohamed Iqbal for the issue of 25 percent of the enlarged share capital of THG Malaysia for Malaysian ringgit 1.23 million.
The sale comprised 884,000 shares at $1.40 ringgit.
THG Malaysia would also issue shares for cash at par to Nik Hussein, to enable him to retain his five percent stake in the enlarged capital of the company, the statement said.
The enlarged share capital will be 3.5 million shares, after the issue of new shares and increase in paid-up capital to 2.65 million ringgit, it said.
